alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 1:40PM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, and ice accumulations of around one-tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett County. In West Virginia, Grant County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow between 7 and 10 AM. The snow will mix with sleet and freezing rain after noon, before ending during the early evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
